00026 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }

00028 CGameControl::CGameControl(bool &firsttime) :
00029 mp_GameLauncher(NULL),
00030 mp_PassiveMode(NULL),
00031 mp_PlayGame(NULL),
00032 m_firsttime(firsttime),
00033 mp_FirstTimeMenu(NULL)
00034 {
00035  m_mode = GAMELAUNCHER;
00036  m_Episode = 0;
00037  m_ChosenGame = 0;
00038  m_Numplayers = 1;
00039  m_endgame = false;
00040 
00041  m_EGAGraphics = NULL;
00042  m_startLevel = 0;
00043 }

00045 ////
00046 // Initialization Routine
00047 /////*/*/*
00048 bool CGameControl::init(int argc, char *argv[])
00049 {
00050  bool ok;
00051  std::string argument;
00052  argument = getArgument( argc, argv, "-game" );
00053 
00054  ok = init();
00055 
00056  if (!ok) return false;
00057 
00058  if(argument != "")
00059  {
00060   int chosengame = 0;
00061   std::string buf = argument.substr(strlen("-game"));
00062   chosengame = atoi(buf)-1;
00063 
00064   if(chosengame >= 0)
00065   {
00066    mp_GameLauncher->setChosenGame(chosengame);
00067 
00068    // Now check, if a level was also passed as parameter
00069    argument = getArgument( argc, argv, "-level" );
00070    buf = argument.substr(strlen("-level"));
00071 
00072    m_startLevel = atoi(buf);
00073    m_Numplayers = 1;
00074   }
00075  }
00076 
00077  // Check if finale cutscenes must be shown
00078  if(getBooleanArgument( argc, argv, "-finale" ))
00079  {
00080   int finalegame;
00081   argument = getArgument( argc, argv, "-finale" );
00082   finalegame = atoi(argument.c_str()+strlen("-finale"))-1;
00083   mp_GameLauncher->setChosenGame(finalegame);
00084   m_startLevel = WM_MAP_NUM;
00085   m_show_finale = true;
00086  }
00087  else m_show_finale = false;
00088 
00089  return ok;
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool CGameControl::init(char mode)
00093 {
00094  m_mode = mode;
00095  CExeFile &ExeFile = g_pBehaviorEngine->m_ExeFile;
00096  if(m_mode == GAMELAUNCHER)
00097  {
00098   // Load the graphics for menu and background.
00099   mp_GameLauncher = new CGameLauncher();
00100         if(!mp_GameLauncher->init())
00101         {
00102             g_pLogFile->textOut(RED,"The game cannot start, because you are missing game data files.<br>");
00103             return false;
00104         }
00105 
00106      // If game was started for the first time, also open the firsttime dialog with configs.
00107      if(m_firsttime)
00108      {
00109       m_firsttime = false;
00110 
00111       mp_FirstTimeMenu = new CProfilesMenu(DLG_THEME_RED);
00112      }
00113 
00114         // Resources for the main menu
00115   if(!loadMenuResources()) return false;
00116 
00117   return true;
00118  }
00119  else if(m_mode == PASSIVE)
00120  {
00121   // Create mp_PassiveMode object used for the screens while Player is not playing
00122   if(m_Episode >= 4)
00123    mp_PassiveMode = new galaxy::CPassiveGalaxy( ExeFile, m_SavedGame, mp_option );
00124   else
00125    mp_PassiveMode = new vorticon::CPassiveVort( ExeFile, m_SavedGame, mp_option );
00126 
00127   if( m_endgame == true )
00128   {
00129    m_endgame = false;
00130    // TODO: Overload this function for galaxy
00131    if( mp_PassiveMode->init(mp_PassiveMode->TITLE) ) return true;
00132   }
00133   else
00134   {
00135    if( mp_PassiveMode->init() ) return true;
00136   }
00137  }
00138  else if(m_mode == PLAYGAME)
00139  {
00140   bool ok = true;
00141 
00142   if(m_Episode >= 4)
00143   {
00144    mp_PlayGame = new galaxy::CPlayGameGalaxy( ExeFile, m_startLevel,
00145              m_Numplayers, m_Difficulty,
00146              mp_option, m_SavedGame);
00147   }
00148   else
00149   {
00150    if(m_startLevel == 0) m_startLevel = WORLD_MAP_LEVEL;
00151    mp_PlayGame = new CPlayGameVorticon( ExeFile, m_startLevel,
00152             m_Numplayers, m_Difficulty,
00153             mp_option, m_show_finale,
00154             m_SavedGame);
00155   }
00156 
00157   m_show_finale = false; // just show it once!!
00158 
00159   if(m_SavedGame.getCommand() == CSavedGame::LOAD)
00160    ok &= mp_PlayGame->loadGameState();
00161   else
00162   {
00163    // Create the special merge effect (Fadeout)
00164    CColorMerge *pColorMergeFX = new CColorMerge(8);
00165 
00166    ok &= mp_PlayGame->init();
00167 
00168    g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(pColorMergeFX);
00169   }
00170   return ok;
00171  }
00172  return false;
00173 }
00174 
00175 ///
00176 // Here the Resources for the menu are loaded. The file used here must exist in the directory
00177 ///
00178 bool CGameControl::loadMenuResources()
00179 {
00180  // Decode the entire graphics for the game (EGALATCH, EGASPRIT, etc.)
00181  if(m_EGAGraphics) delete m_EGAGraphics; // except for the first start of a game this always happens
00182  m_EGAGraphics = new CEGAGraphics(0, "."); // It has to be the local data path where the interpreter is
00183  if(!m_EGAGraphics) return false;
00184  m_EGAGraphics->loadData();
00185  return true;
00186 }

00189 ///
00190 // This is used for loading all the resources of the game the use has chosen.
00191 // It loads graphics, sound and text into the memory
00192 ///
00193 bool CGameControl::loadResources(Uint8 flags)
00194 {
00195  int version;
00196  unsigned char *p_exedata;
00197  unsigned char *p_exeheader;
00198 
00199  CExeFile &ExeFile = g_pBehaviorEngine->m_ExeFile;
00200 
00201  m_SavedGame.setGameDirectory(m_DataDirectory);
00202  m_SavedGame.setEpisode(m_Episode);
00203 
00204  // TODO: not very readable. Check if there is a function for handling that.
00205  if( m_DataDirectory.size() > 0 && m_DataDirectory[m_DataDirectory.size()-1] != '/' )
00206   m_DataDirectory += "/";
00207 
00208     version = ExeFile.getEXEVersion();
00209  p_exedata = ExeFile.getRawData();
00210  p_exeheader = ExeFile.getHeaderData();
00211 
00212  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Commander Keen Episode %d (Version %d.%d) was detected.<br>", m_Episode, version/100, version%100);
00213  if( m_Episode == 1 && version == 134) g_pLogFile->ftextOut("This version of the game is not supported!<br>");
00214 
00215  if(p_exeheader == NULL) {
00216   g_pLogFile->textOut(RED, "CGameControl::loadResources: Could not load data from the EXE File<br>");
00217   return false;
00218  }
00219 
00220  // Patch the EXE-File-Data directly in the memory.
00221  CPatcher Patcher(ExeFile);
00222  Patcher.patchMemory();
00223 
00224  g_pBehaviorEngine->setEpisode(m_Episode);
00225 
00226  if( m_Episode == 1 || m_Episode == 2 || m_Episode == 3 ) // Vorticon resources
00227  {
00228   g_pBehaviorEngine->readTeleporterTable(p_exedata);
00229 
00230   if( (flags & LOADGFX) == LOADGFX )
00231   {
00232    // Decode the entire graphics for the game (EGALATCH, EGASPRIT, etc.)
00233    // This will also read the Tile-Properties
00234    SAFE_DELETE(m_EGAGraphics); // except for the first start of a game this always happens
00235    m_EGAGraphics = new vorticon::CEGAGraphicsVort(m_Episode, m_DataDirectory);
00236    if(!m_EGAGraphics) return false;
00237 
00238    m_EGAGraphics->loadData( version, p_exedata );
00239   }
00240 
00241   if( (flags & LOADSTR) == LOADSTR )
00242   {
00243    // load the strings.
00244    CMessages Messages(p_exedata, m_Episode, version);
00245    Messages.extractGlobalStrings();
00246   }
00247 
00248   if( (flags & LOADSND) == LOADSND )
00249   {
00250    // Load the sound data
00251    g_pSound->setGameData(ExeFile);
00252    g_pSound->loadSoundData(ExeFile);
00253   }
00254 
00255   g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings().loadGameConstants(m_Episode, p_exedata);
00256 
00257   return true;
00258  }
00259  else if( m_Episode == 4 || m_Episode == 5 || m_Episode == 6 ) // Galaxy resources
00260  {
00261   // TODO: Lots of coding
00262   if( (flags & LOADGFX) == LOADGFX )
00263   {
00264    // Decode the entire graphics for the game (Only EGAGRAPH.CK?)
00265    SAFE_DELETE(m_EGAGraphics);
00266 
00267    m_EGAGraphics = new galaxy::CEGAGraphicsGalaxy(ExeFile); // Path is relative to the data directory
00268    if(!m_EGAGraphics) return false;
00269 
00270    m_EGAGraphics->loadData();
00271   }
00272 
00273   if( (flags & LOADSTR) == LOADSTR )
00274   {
00275    // load the strings.
00276    // TODO:
00277   }
00278 
00279   if( (flags & LOADSND) == LOADSND )
00280   {
00281    // Load the sound data
00282    // TODO:
00283   }
00284  }
00285  return true;
00286 }

00289 ////
00290 // Process Routine
00291 ////
00292 // This function is run every time, the Timer says so, through.
00293 void CGameControl::process()
00294 {
00295  //// First we must know in which mode we are. There are three:
00296  // The first menu of the game
00297  if(m_mode == GAMELAUNCHER)
00298  {
00299   // If the firsttime menu is open, process it
00300   if(mp_FirstTimeMenu)
00301   {
00302    mp_FirstTimeMenu->processCommon();
00303    mp_FirstTimeMenu->processSpecific();
00304    mp_FirstTimeMenu->postProcess();
00305 
00306    if(mp_FirstTimeMenu->mustClose())
00307     SAFE_DELETE(mp_FirstTimeMenu);
00308   }
00309   else
00310   {
00311    // Launch the code of the Startmenu here! The one for choosing the games
00312    mp_GameLauncher->process();
00313    m_ChosenGame = mp_GameLauncher->getChosengame();
00314 
00315    if( mp_GameLauncher->waschosen() )
00316    {
00317     //// Game has been chosen. Launch it!
00318     // Get the path were to Launch the game
00319     m_DataDirectory = mp_GameLauncher->getDirectory( m_ChosenGame );
00320 
00321     // We have to check which Episode will be used
00322     m_Episode = mp_GameLauncher->getEpisode( m_ChosenGame );
00323 
00324     if( m_Episode > 0 ) // The game has to have a valid episode!
00325     {
00326      // Get the EXE-Data of the game and load it into the memory.
00327      if(!g_pBehaviorEngine->m_ExeFile.readData(m_Episode, m_DataDirectory))
00328      {
00329       mp_GameLauncher->letchooseagain();
00330       delete mp_PassiveMode;
00331       mp_PassiveMode = NULL;
00332      }
00333      else
00334      {
00335       // Load the Resources
00336       if( loadResources() )
00337       {
00338        // Now look if there are any old savegames that need to be converted
00339        CSavedGame savedgames;
00340        savedgames.setGameDirectory(m_DataDirectory);
00341        savedgames.setEpisode(m_Episode);
00342        savedgames.convertAllOldFormats();
00343 
00344        if(m_startLevel == 0) // Starts normally
00345        {
00346         if(init(PASSIVE)) cleanup(GAMELAUNCHER);
00347         else
00348         {
00349          mp_GameLauncher->letchooseagain();
00350          delete mp_PassiveMode;
00351          mp_PassiveMode = NULL;
00352         }
00353        }
00354        else // This happens, when a level was passed as argument when launching CG
00355        {
00356         if(init(PLAYGAME)) cleanup(GAMELAUNCHER);
00357         else
00358         {
00359          mp_GameLauncher->letchooseagain();
00360          delete mp_PlayGame; mp_PlayGame = NULL;
00361         }
00362        }
00363       }
00364      }
00365     }
00366     else
00367     {
00368      mp_GameLauncher->letchooseagain();
00369      g_pLogFile->textOut(RED,"No Suitable game was detected in this path! Please check its contents!\n");
00370     }
00371    }
00372    else if(mp_GameLauncher->getQuit())
00373    {
00374     // User chose exit. So quit...
00375     m_mode = SHUTDOWN;
00376    }
00377   }
00378  }
00379  // Intro, Title screen, and demo mode are performed by the passive class CPassive
00380  else if(m_mode == PASSIVE)
00381  {
00382   if(mp_PlayGame != NULL)
00383   {
00384    if( mp_PlayGame->getEndGame() )
00385    {
00386     mp_PassiveMode->m_mode = PLAYGAME;
00387    }
00388   }
00389   mp_PassiveMode->process();
00390 
00391   // check here what the player chose from the menu over the passive mode.
00392   // NOTE: Demo is not part of playgame anymore!!
00393   if(mp_PassiveMode->getchooseGame())
00394   {
00395    // TODO: Some of game resources are still not cleaned up here!
00396    init( GAMELAUNCHER );
00397    return;
00398   }
00399 
00400   if(mp_PassiveMode->mustStartGame())
00401   {
00402    m_Episode = mp_PassiveMode->getEpisode();
00403    m_Numplayers = mp_PassiveMode->getNumPlayers();
00404    m_Difficulty = mp_PassiveMode->getDifficulty();
00405    m_DataDirectory = mp_PassiveMode->getGamePath();
00406 
00407    init( PLAYGAME );
00408    delete mp_PassiveMode;
00409    mp_PassiveMode=NULL;
00410    return;
00411   }
00412 
00413   // User wants to exit. Called from the PassiveMode
00414   if(mp_PassiveMode->getExitEvent())
00415    m_mode = SHUTDOWN;
00416  }
00417  // Here goes the PlayGame Engine
00418  else if(m_mode == PLAYGAME)
00419  {
00420   // The player is playing the game. It also includes scenes like ending
00421   mp_PlayGame->process();
00422 
00423   if( mp_PlayGame->getEndGame() )
00424   {
00425    m_startLevel = 0;
00426    m_endgame = true;
00427    init(PASSIVE);
00428    delete mp_PlayGame; mp_PlayGame = NULL;
00429   }
00430   else if( mp_PlayGame->getStartGame() )
00431   { // Start another new game
00432    m_Numplayers = mp_PlayGame->getNumPlayers();
00433    m_Difficulty = mp_PlayGame->getDifficulty();
00434 
00435    delete mp_PlayGame; mp_PlayGame = NULL;
00436    init(PLAYGAME);
00437   }
00438   else if( mp_PlayGame->getExitEvent() )
00439    m_mode = SHUTDOWN;
00440  }
00441  // That should never happen!
00442  else
00443  {
00444   // Something went wrong here! send warning and load startmenu
00445   m_mode = GAMELAUNCHER;
00446  }
00447 
00448 }
00449 
00450 void CGameControl::cleanup(char mode)
00451 {
00452  // Check, whatever is active and clean it up!
00453  if(mode == GAMELAUNCHER && mp_GameLauncher)
00454  {
00455   mp_GameLauncher->cleanup();
00456   delete mp_GameLauncher; mp_GameLauncher = NULL;
00457  }
00458  else if(mode == PASSIVE && mp_PassiveMode)
00459  {
00460   mp_PassiveMode->cleanup();
00461   delete mp_PassiveMode; mp_PassiveMode = NULL;
00462  }
00463  else if(mode == PLAYGAME && mp_PlayGame)
00464  {
00465   mp_PlayGame->cleanup();
00466   delete mp_PlayGame; mp_PlayGame = NULL;
00467  }
00468 }
00469 
00470 void CGameControl::cleanupAll()
00471 {
00472  // Check, whatever is active and clean it up!
00473  if(mp_GameLauncher)
00474  {
00475   mp_GameLauncher->cleanup();
00476   delete mp_GameLauncher; mp_GameLauncher = NULL;
00477  }
00478 
00479  if(mp_PassiveMode)
00480  {
00481   mp_PassiveMode->cleanup();
00482   delete mp_PassiveMode; mp_PassiveMode = NULL;
00483  }
00484 
00485  if(mp_PlayGame)
00486  {
00487   mp_PlayGame->cleanup();
00488   delete mp_PlayGame; mp_PlayGame = NULL;
00489  }
00490 }
00491 
00492 
00493 CGameControl::~CGameControl() {
00494  cleanupAll();
00495  if(m_EGAGraphics) delete m_EGAGraphics;
00496 }
